colophon_(төгсгөлийн_үг): @010A *, ,(CES RJE BDAG NYID CHEN PO RGYAN DRUG MCHOG GNYIS CHOS BSRUNG YE SHES KYI MGON PO DANG BCAS PA LA PHYAG MCHOD GSOL BA 'DEBS PA'I TSUL LAG TU BLANG BDE BAR BKOD PA BYIN RLABS NYIN BYED 'DREN PA'I SHING RTA ZHES BYA BA 'DI NI, GZHUNG LUGS RAB 'BYAMS SMRA BA'I DBANG PO RDO RAMS PA BLO BZANG RAB GSAL GYIS BKRA SHIS PA'I LHA RDZAS DANG BCAS NAN TAN @010B CHEN POS YANG YANG BSKUL BA LA BRTEN NAS, SANGS RGYAS KUN 'DUS KYI NGO BO BLA MA RDO RJE 'CHANG YAB SRAS RNAMS KYI BKA' DRIN KHO NAS NYE BAR 'TSO GA SH'AKYA'I RJES 'JUG BLO BZANG TSUL KHRIMS RGYA MTSOS CHOS GRVA CHEN PO BKRA SHIS 'KHYIL GYI RANG GSHAGS CHOS 'BYOR DGA' TSAL DU BRIS PA 'DIS KYANG GSER ZHUN COD PAn 'CHANG PA'I RING LUGS PHYOGS KUN TU DAR ZHING RGYAS PAR BYED NUS PAR GYUR CIG ,) AOm SVA STI, THUB BSTAN SROG SHING MKHAS GRUB RGYU SKAR PHRENG, ,DAD PA'I YID MTSO MDZES PA'I RTZE DGA' LAS, ,BSHAD SGRUB 'KHRI SHING GAR GYIS BRTZEN PA'I PHYIR, ,DPAR GYI MCHOD SBYIN LUM PI'I TSAL DU BSGRUBS,, ,,SARBA MANGGA LAm, ,
